subScenes.name: 欢迎致辞
subScenes.description: HR欢迎新员工并简要介绍入职流程

qaPairs.speakerText: Welcome aboard! I'm Lisa, your HR rep. You're gonna love it here.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 欢迎加入！我是HR丽莎，你会喜欢这儿的。

responses.text: Thanks, Lisa! I'm really excited to get started.
responses.text_cn: 谢谢丽莎！我超期待开始工作。

responses.text: It's great to be here! I appreciate the warm welcome.
responses.text_cn: 很高兴加入，谢谢你的热情接待。

responses.text: Thanks!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！

qaPairs.usageNote: 用积极语气回应欢迎，建立良好第一印象

qaPairs.speakerText: We've got a quick orientation today—just the basics to help you settle in.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 今天我们会快速过一下入职流程，帮你快速适应。

responses.text: Perfect! I'm ready to learn everything.
responses.text_cn: 太好了！我准备好了，想学所有内容。

responses.text: That sounds good—I just want to make sure I don't miss anything.
responses.text_cn: 听起来不错，我不想漏掉任何重点。

responses.text: Got it.
responses.text_cn: 明白。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达积极态度，展现学习意愿

subScenes.name: 确认日程
subScenes.description: 确认入职培训的具体安排和时间

qaPairs.speakerText: So, after this, you'll meet your team at 10:30, then IT will walk you through the system.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 接下来10:30见团队，之后IT会教你用系统。

responses.text: Wait, is the IT session at 10:30 or 11? I want to be on time.
responses.text_cn: 等等，IT是10:30还是11点？我想准时到。

responses.text: Got it—team at 10:30, then IT. Thanks for clarifying!
responses.text_cn: 明白了，10:30见团队，然后IT。谢谢说明！

responses.text: Okay.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动确认时间，避免误解影响安排

qaPairs.speakerText: Lunch is at 12, and we'll do a quick office tour after that.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 中午12点吃午饭，之后我们会简单逛一下办公室。

responses.text: Is there a cafeteria nearby? I'm not sure where to go.
responses.text_cn: 附近有食堂吗？我不太清楚去哪儿吃。

responses.text: Sounds good—I'll be ready after lunch.
responses.text_cn: 不错，午饭后我准备好了。

responses.text: Cool.
responses.text_cn: 挺好。

qaPairs.usageNote: 询问细节，体现主动适应的态度

subScenes.name: 领取用品
subScenes.description: 领取电脑、门卡、文具等办公用品

qaPairs.speakerText: Here's your laptop, badge, and starter kit—pen, notepad, and company mug.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这是你的笔记本电脑、门卡和入职礼包：笔、笔记本和公司马克杯。

responses.text: Wow, the mug's cute! Thanks so much!
responses.text_cn: 哇，杯子真可爱！太感谢了！

responses.text: Could I get a second notepad? I tend to go through them fast.
responses.text_cn: 能再给我一本笔记本吗？我用得特别快。

responses.text: Thanks!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！

qaPairs.usageNote: 礼貌感谢+合理请求，展现良好沟通

qaPairs.speakerText: Your badge works on floors 3–5 and the main entrance—just tap it.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你的门卡能刷3到5楼和主入口，轻触就行。

responses.text: What if it doesn't work? Who should I call?
responses.text_cn: 如果刷不了，我该找谁？

responses.text: Got it—tap and go. Super easy!
responses.text_cn: 明白了，轻触就行，真简单！

responses.text: Alright.
responses.text_cn: 好。

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认使用方法，避免后续麻烦

subScenes.name: 熟悉环境
subScenes.description: HR带新员工参观办公室关键区域

qaPairs.speakerText: This is the kitchen—coffee, snacks, and the microwave are all free.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这是休息区，咖啡、零食和微波炉都免费。

responses.text: Do you have tea too? I'm not much of a coffee drinker.
responses.text_cn: 有茶吗？我不太喝咖啡。

responses.text: Nice! I'll be here every morning.
responses.text_cn: 太好了！我每天早上都来。

responses.text: Cool.
responses.text_cn: 不错。

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达需求或兴趣，促进同事互动

qaPairs.speakerText: The restrooms are down the hall to the left, and the printer’s right across from the elevators.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 洗手间在走廊左边，打印机在电梯对面。

responses.text: Is the printer color-capable? I’ve got a presentation tomorrow.
responses.text_cn: 打印机能打彩色吗？我明天要交演示稿。

responses.text: Got it—left for restrooms, right for printer.
responses.text_cn: 明白了，左边洗手间，右边打印机。

responses.text: OK.
responses.text_cn: 好的。

qaPairs.usageNote: 针对实际需求提问，避免尴尬失误

subScenes.name: 礼貌道别
subScenes.description: 培训结束，与HR或同事友好告别

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, you're all set! Let me know if you need help with anything.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了，你都搞定了！有事随时找我。

responses.text: Thanks so much, Lisa—you've been super helpful!
responses.text_cn: 太感谢你了，丽莎，你帮了我大忙！

responses.text: I will! Have a great rest of your day.
responses.text_cn: 我会的！祝你今天愉快。

responses.text: Appreciate it!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢！

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达感谢+主动反馈，留下好印象

qaPairs.speakerText: See you tomorrow at 9! Don't be nervous—you're gonna do great.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 明天9点见！别紧张，你一定会做得很棒。

responses.text: Thanks for the confidence boost—I'll be here bright and early!
responses.text_cn: 谢谢鼓励，我会准时到！

responses.text: See you tomorrow!
responses.text_cn: 明天见！

responses.text: I'll try!
responses.text_cn: 我会努力的！

qaPairs.usageNote: 回应鼓励时展现积极态度，自然收尾
